oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sclavonia, Croatia, Bosnia cum Dalmatiæ parte
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mercator, Gerhard , 1512-1594
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Apperas in: Nieuwen atlas ofte werelt-beschrijvinge vertoonende de voornaemste rijckenende lande des gheheelen aerdt-bodems / Ioannem Ianssonium. 1657-[87]. Vol. 1, map No. 138.
Covers Slovenia, Croatia, Bosnia and Hercegovina and portions of Hungary, Serbia and Montenegro.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Scale [ca. 1:1,000,000].
Balkan Peninsula
